name: Alchemy rush
description:
THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR "MINI GAME JAM 85"

A fast-pacet game, where you are trying to make a potion, that can turn iron into gold, in 5 days.

Its unfinished. I know there are many bugs so please let me know in the comments so I can fix them more easily in the future and hopefully finish the game.

Still I hope you appreciate at least the idea. :D
